parsing_result:
# Shortcut Options

Customize camera controls to suit your style or situation.

Frequently-used options can be added to the Q menu or a custom “my” menu or assigned to an Fn (function) button for direct access:

| Shortcut Option     | Description                                                                                                                                         |
|---------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| “My menu”           | Add frequently-used options to this custom menu, which can be viewed by pressing **MENU/OK** and selecting the **MY** (“MY MENU”) tab.              |
| The Q menu          | The Q menu is displayed by pressing the **Q** button. Use the Q menu to view or change the options selected for frequently-used menu items.         |
| The function buttons| Use the function buttons for direct access to selected features.                                                                                    |
